actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to provide that the lake referred to as the Ririe Lake on Willow Creek, in Bonneville County, Idaho, shall hereafter be known as Oscar Johnson Lake.

summary.text: Redesignates the Ririe Lake on Willow Creek, Bonneville County, Idaho, as the "Oscar Johnson Lake."

titles.title: A bill to provide that the lake referred to as the Ririe Lake on Willow Creek, in Bonneville County, Idaho, shall hereafter be known as Oscar Johnson Lake.
